time-name.description: time (clock) widget toggle title in the menu.

search-bar-name.description: search bar widget toggle title in the menu.

to-do-list-name.description: to do list widget toggle title in the menu and on the widget itself

background-title.description: background (section title in menu) and others

effects-title.description: Effects section title in the menu

about-this-extension.description: about this extension button in the menu

seach-menu-desc.description: menu description of search bar toggle

info-menu-desc.description: menu description of info name toggle

todo-menu-desc.description: menu description of todo list toggle

fav-button-desc.message: add or remove this background from your favorites

brightness-desc.message: adjust the brightness of the background

saturation-desc.message: adjust the saturation of the background

contrast-desc.message: adjust the contrast of the background

blur-desc.message: adjust the blurring of the background

no-source-title.description: title of no source selected message

no-source-content.message: a default background was loaded. Please select a source in the left hand menu, and then refresh the page.
no-source-content.description: content of no source selected message

too-many-removed-title.description: title of too many backgrounds removed message

too-many-removed-content.message: a default background was loaded. you have removed all backgrounds in the sources you selected, you can reset your removed backgrounds or select more background sources.
too-many-removed-content.description: content of too many backgrounds removed message

too-many-removed-reset.description: reset button of too many backgrounds removed message

remove-bg-content.message: this will remove the background. you can't undo this action unless you reset the extension with the reset button in the menu.

remove-bg-confirm.description: confirm button of remove background message

no-fav-content.message: you don't have any favorite backgrounds. to add backgrounds to favorites, scroll down the menu and click the heart when you see a background you like.

reset-title.message: are you sure you want to reset your data?

reset-content.message: choose what data you would like to reset:

reset-widget-location.description: widgets location option of reset menu

reset-widget-data.description: widgets pref and data option of reset menu

reset-fav-backgrounds.description: favorite backgrounds option of reset menu

reset-removed-backgrounds.description: removed backgrounds option of reset menu

ui-animations.description: ui animation option in advanced options

ui-animations-desc.description: ui animation option description in advanced options

avoid-repeats.description: avoid repeats option in advanced options

avoid-repeats-desc.description: avoid repeats option description in advanced options

auto-pause-background.description: auto-Pause background option in advanced options

auto-pause-background-desc.message: automatically pause animated backgrounds when tab is not active
auto-pause-background-desc.description: auto-Pause background option description in advanced options

no-internet-title.message: no internet access. Please check your connection and try again.
